summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 4, 2019, discussing a New York Post article titled 'John Doe begs judge not to name names in Epstein gal pal case.' The email shows FBI personnel in New York and CID (Criminal Investigative Division) forwarding the article and asking if they know the identity of the anonymous 'John Doe' mentioned.

events.title: New York Post article about John Doe in Epstein case
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article titled 'John Doe begs judge not to name names in Epstein gal pal case,' reporting on an anonymous individual seeking to avoid being publicly identified in legal proceedings related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An internal FBI email from September 4, 2019, discusses a New York Post article about a 'John Doe' in the Epstein case.
The article, published on September 3, 2019, reports that an anonymous 'John Doe' is petitioning a judge to avoid having their name disclosed in a case involving an Epstein 'gal pal.'
FBI personnel are inquiring among themselves to identify who this 'John Doe' might be, indicating investigative interest in the individual's identity.
